Package fwrp.controller

package fwrp.controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddInventoryServlet
    This servlet let the user add an item in the inventory.
    ClaimInventoryServlet
    This servlet handles the claiming of an inventory item by a user.
    FeedbackServlet
    FeedbackServlet is a servlet that handles the submission of feedback from users.
    LoginServlet
    LoginServlet handles the login functionality for the application.
    NotificationCountServlet
    Servlet implementation class NotificationCountServlet This servlet is responsible for retrieving the notification count for a user and forwarding the request to the charity homepage view.
    PurchaseInventoryServlet
    Servlet implementation class PurchaseInventoryServlet Handles the purchasing of inventory items.
    RegisServlet
    Servlet implementation class RegisServlet.
    ResetCountServlet
    Servlet implementation class ResetCountServlet This servlet handles the request to reset the user's count.
    UpdateInventoryServlet
    Servlet implementation class UpdateInventoryServlet.
